name: Ocean
description: Ocean Mining announced in April 2024 that miners can submit a BOLT 12 offer in order to receive their payouts from the pool over Lightning."Using BOLT12 also allows us to prove to the world that a payment was made, the size of the payment, the node to which it was paid, and that it was paid by us."

name: Zeus
description: Zeus, a lightning wallet for the gods, has an alpha release which integrates with Twelve Cash, allowing Core Lightning users to create their own BOLT 12 offer and create a @twelve.cash username.

name: Human Readable Address
description: This BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) defines a way to put bitcoin payment info into DNS records, allowing for something resembling an email address that a user can pay to. These can include BOLT 12 offers, as well as any other static bitcoin payment identifier.

name: Twelve Cash
description: Twelve Cash is an implementation of the Human Readable Payments BIP. It includes an API you can use for creating @twelve.cash usernames in your lightning app, as well as a website frontend for creating usernames and validating addresses.

name: Clams
description: Clams Remote, a tool for managing your Core Lightning node, allows you to create and pay BOLT 12 offers.

name: ROYGBIV
description: ROYGBIV is a prism plugin for Core Lightning. You can create a BOLT 12 offer that, when paid to, splits the payment out automatically to many recipients.

name: Ride the Lightning
description: RTL, a lightning node management UI, allows Core Lightning node oeprators to create BOLT 12 offers.
